The most common word “essay” which is constantly used in academic writing comes from the French language and means an attempt, sample, and sketch in writing. In modern terms, the word “essay” means a small piece of writing on a given topic. This type of writing presumes presenting personal beliefs regarding an issue in a simple manner. It means that one should not be informative, but present his or her personal ideas. Consequently, a custom writing essay requires introducing your personal thoughts for the reader while following some literary requirements.
